ygData.subject: Re: Welp... it was me :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, I ve kind of decided to shut up since it s just aggravating me and it doesn t appear that these guys are interested in actually doing the class
ygData.messageBody:
Tim Burke wrote:

> ... And finally...
>
> Abashi chose my post give his response. Granted, my post was a rant, but
> it got his attention. My post definitely didn't have the substance that
> John Kim's lullaby post has. Nor is my post anywhere near being as thorough
> as Kedian (sp) bard petition post. Both of these threads have over 200+
> hits, but no response from Abashi. Answering my rant was the easy way out
> for Abashi, and he took it. Instead of spending the time and effort to
> offer meaningful responses, we get a flame. If my post hurt the bards case
> in the long run, I am sorry, but clearly the patient approach isn't getting
> things done.

Yeah, I've kind of decided to shut up since it's just aggravating me and it doesn't appear that these guys
are interested in actually doing the class balance stuff that this class could use. But the fact that he
responded to your message while there were two substantive posts hanging out on the first page for more
than a week (that nobody has responded to in any way at all) didn't help my mood any. And he didn't even
address the more salient parts of YOUR post... You have nothing to apologize for.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 43 songs (again), Innoruuk
